10111000	$3 = 0
10000111	$2 = M[$3]
00111001	$3 = 1
00110000	$1 = 0
00111100	$4 = 0
10101010	$3 << 1
01000001	$1 = $1 + $3
00101000	$1 << 1
01000100	$3 = $3 + $1
10110001	$1 = 1
10000100	$1 = M[$1]
01001110	Pc = PC+3 if $3<$1 
00100100	$3 = $3 - $1
01101001	j line 9 (mod:)
10110001	$1 = 1
00100010	$2 = $2 - $1
00110000	$1 = 0
11001001	Pc = pc+2 if $2<$1
01100011	jump to line 3 (pwr:)
10110100	$2 = 0
11000011	$2 = $2 + $3
10011010	M[2] = $2
01110010 	jump to line 18 (done:)
